name: hoodFanSpeedLevel_setValue
description: This function is used to set the fan speed of the hood to a specific numeric value.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the fan speed.

parameters.name: hoodFanSpeedLevel
parameters.description: The specific numeric value to set the fan speed.
